confirmationTimeStamp.description: The timestamp reflecting when the trade or subsequent post trade event was confirmed by the source platform

transactionType.description: The current confirmed transaction type affecting the position

productType.description: Supported Credit Products (implicit by Asset class), bound by enum type

uniqueProductId.description: The role of the Unique Product Identifier (UPI, ISO 4914)  is to uniquely identify the product involved in an OTC derivatives transaction that an authority requires, or may require in the future, to be reported to a Trade Repository (TR).

productClassificationId.description: The Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI, ISO 10962), is a six-letter-code used to classify and describe the structure and function of a financial instrument (in the form of security or contract) as part of the instrument reference data

productIdentifierIsin.description: An International Securities Identification Number (ISO 6166 ISIN) is a 12-digit alphanumeric code that uniquely the Credit Derivative Product

activeStatus.description: SourcePlatform determination of whether the trade/position is active or inactive

inactiveReason.description: SourcePlatform reason for why a trade/position was made inactive

eventProcessType.description: The event processing on the DTCC TIW (Rename, Restructuring, Reorganization, Credit) or TradeServ (Bulk Novations or Account Swing) that resulted in the confirmed trade/transaction

eventProcessingId.description: The Event Processing ID is used to represent when the trade is part of a multi-transaction event (e.g. credit event, compression)

blockId.description: A reference to a block trade

creditEventOriginalDtccTiwId.description: DTCC Trade Identifer that identifies the original trade related to the reorganization/restructuring event that triggered the TIW initiated Trade confirmation.

creditEventOriginalPartyTradeId.description: Original Party TradeId that identifies the original trade upon which a DTCC TIW initiated Credit Event has been applied

creditEconomicDetail.description: The Credit economic details - covers all products under the credit asset classe

workflowDetail.description: Workflow detail that captures all the possible party and counterparty workflow fields

legalConfirmationDetail.description: DocumenationDetail structure used to model documentation

effectiveDate.description: The first day of the term of the trade. This day may be subject to adjustment in accordance with a business day convention. ISDA 2003 Term: Effective Date

scheduledTerminationDate.description: The maturity date for the CDS

fixedRatePayer.description: The Fixed Rate Payer is the party that is 'buying' the cds

floatingRatePayer.description: The Floating Rate Payer is the party that is 'selling' the cds

dateAdjustmentBusinessCenters.description: The set of business centers is used to determine whether a particular day is a business day or not

originalTradeNotionalAmount.description: The original notional amount of the Trade (or EE/RP leg) when the position was created

originalTradeNotionalCurrency.description: The original notional currency of the Trade (or EE/RP leg) when the position was created

additionalTerms.description: Represents information contained in the Additional Terms field of the 2003 ISDA Master Credit Derivatives confirm.

optionalEarlyTerminationApplicable.description: Indicates that optional early termination is applicable

modifiedEquityDeliveryApplicable.description: Indicates that modified equity delivery is applicable

cashSettlementRecoveryPrice.description: Used for Fixed Recovery, specifies the recovery level, determined at contract inception, to be applied on a default. Used to calculate the amount paid by the seller to the buyer for cash settlement on the cash settlement date. Amount calculation is (1 minus the Cash Settlement Recovery Price) multiplied by the Floating Rate Payer Calculation Amount. The currency will be derived from the Floating Rate Payer Calculation Amount.

cashSettlementFixedSettlement.description: Used for Recovery Lock, to indicate whether fixed Settlement is Applicable or Not Applicable

independentAmountPaymentPercent.description: Independent amount as a percentage of the transactions's value

mortgageInsurerApplicable.description: Indicates that the mortgage Insurer is applicable

mortgageLegalFinalMaturityDate.description: The date when the principal amount of a security becomes due and payable

mortgageOriginalPrincipalAmount.description: The initial issued amount of the mortgage obligation

mortgageInitialFactor.description: The part of the mortgage that is outstanding on trade inception, i.e. has not been repaid yet as principal

mortgageSector.description: The sector classification of the mortgage obligation

referencePolicyApplicable.description: Indicates that the reference policy is applicable on a mortgage-backed security

referencePrice.description: Used to determine a settlement amount

loanCreditAgreementDate.description: The credit agreement date is the closing date (the date where the agreement has been signed) for the loans in the credit agreement

trancheAttachmentPoint.description: Lower bound percentage of the loss that the Tranche can endure, expressed as a decimal. The difference between Attachment and Exhaustion points is call the width of the Tranche.

trancheExhaustionPoint.description: Upper bound percentage of the loss that the Tranche can endure, expressed as a decimal

additionalComments.description: Any additional comments associated with the trade

referenceInformationDetail.description: The reference information that may be applicable for all the different types of credit default swap products

feeLegDetail.description: The economic details for the Fee Leg of a credit default swap

protectionTermsDetail.description: The protection terms details for a credit default swap

swaptionDetail.description: The swaption details, if the CDS is a swaption

redId.description: S&P Reference Entity Data - Red 6, Red  9, or SRO Red9 ID for the Trade

redIdType.description: Either Red6 or Red9 or SRORed9

referenceEntityName.description: The name of the reference entity/index

submittedObligation.description: This is the ISIN or SRO ISIN or CUSIP as submitted by the party to the trade

submittedReferenceEntityName.description: This is the Reference Entity Name as submitted by the party to the trade

isin.description: An International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) is a 12-digit alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies a underlying asset/reference obligation

cusip.description: The CUSIP identifier that uniquely identifies a underlying asset/reference obligation

bloombergId.description: The Bloomberg identifier that uniquely identifies a underlying asset/reference obligation

referenceUniqueProductId.description: Applicable to MDX Index where RedIds are not in use

securedListApplicable.description: Indicates that a secured list  is applicable

indexAnnexDate.description: The CDS index series annex date.

settledEntityMatrixDate.description: Specifies the publication date of the applicable version of the matrix.

firstPaymentDate.description: The first unadjusted fixed rate payer payment date.  ISDA 2003 Term: Fixed Rate Payer Payment Date

firstPaymentPeriodAccrualStartDate.description: The start date of the initial calculation period if such date is not equal to the tradeâ€™s effective date. It must only be specified if it is not equal to the effective date.

fixedRatePerAnnum.description: The calculation period fixed rate. A per annum rate, expressed as a decimal. A fixed rate of 5% would be represented as 0.05.

fixedAmountPaymentDelayApplicable.description: Whether payment delays are applicable to the fixed Amount

initialPaymentAmount.description: Specifies a one off fixed initial payment amount that is payable by the payer to the receiver on the initial payment date.

paymentFrequencyMonths.description: The time interval in months between regular fixed rate payer payment dates.

singlePaymentAmount.description: Specifies a single fixed amount that is payable by the buyer to the seller on the fixed rate payer payment date

floatingRateForInitialCalculationPeriod.description: The initial floating rate reset agreed between the principal parties involved in the trade. This is assumed to be the first required reset rate for the first regular calculation period.

scheduledFinalFixingDate.description: Final fixing date used in determination of a calculation period amount.

notionalAmount.description: The current notional amount of the Trade (Position). Includes any pte activity that results in a change to current notional

notionalCurrency.description: The notional currency of the Trade

restructuringEvents.description: Whether a Credit Event is applicable

interestShortfallCapApplicable.description: Whether interest shortfall cap is applicable

interestShortfallCapBasis.description: Specifies the nature of the interest Shortfall cap (i.e. Fixed or Variable ) in the case where it is applicable. ISDA 2003 Term: Interest Shortfall Cap

interestShortfallCompoundingApplicable.description: Whether interest shortfall compounding is applicable

interestShortfallRateSource.description: The rate source in the case of a variable cap.

wacCapInterestProvisionApplicable.description: Whether the wap cap interest provision is applicable

designatedPriority.description: Applies to Loan CDS, to indicate what lien level is appropriate for a deliverable obligation

excludedDeliverables.description: A free format string to specify any excluded obligations or deliverable obligations, as the case may be, of the reference entity or excluded types of obligations or deliverable obligations. ISDA 2003 Term: Excluded Obligations/Excluded Deliverable Obligations

cashSettlementOnlyApplicable.description: Whether cash settlement only is applicable

deliveryOfCommitmentsApplicable.description: Whether delivery of commitments is applicable

swaptionBuyer.description: The party that is buying the swaption

swaptionSeller.description: The party that is selling the swaption

swaptionExpirationDate.description: The expiration date. This date is subject to adjustment in accordance with any applicable business day convention.

swaptionPremiumPayer.description: The party responsible for paying the premium payment

swaptionPremiumReceiver.description: The party responsible for receiving the premium payment

swaptionPremiumPaymentDate.description: The payment date. This date is subject to adjustment in accordance with any applicable business day convention.

ccpOfUnderlyingSwap.description: The CCP (clearing house) of the underlying swap

partyDesignatedPartyId.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

partyBrokerName.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

partyEtradingTrn.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

partyDeskId.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

partySuperId.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

partyBranchLocation.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

partyMidMarketPriceType.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

partyMidMarketPriceValue.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

partyComment.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Not viewable by counterparty

counterpartyDesignatedPartyId.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

counterpartyBrokerName.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

counterpartyEtradingTrn.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

counterpartyDeskId.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

counterpartySuperId.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

counterpartyBranchLocation.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

counterpartyMidMarketPriceType.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

counterpartyMidMarketPriceValue.description: The content of this field is free-form, and the type of information is at the users discretion. Viewable by counterparty

documentationType.description: Master documentation type, if populated, one of SwaptionSupplement, Matrix, StandardTermsSupplement or MasterConfirmation

underlyingDocumentationType.description: The underlying documentation type for a CDSSwaption or CDSIndexSwaption

underlyingMasterDocumentTransactionType.description: The underlying master documentation transaction type for a CDSSwaption or CDSIndexSwaption

underlyingMasterDocumentDate.description: The underlying master documentation date for a CDSSwaption or CDSIndexSwaption

contractualDefinitions.description: The definitions such as those published by ISDA that will define the terms of the trade

masterAgreementType.description: The agreement executed between the parties and intended to govern product-specific credit derivatives transactions between those parties

masterAgreementDate.description: The date on which the master agreement was signed

masterAgreementVersion.description: The version of the master agreement

masterConfirmationType.description: The type of master confirmation executed between the parties

masterConfirmationDate.description: The date of the confirmation executed between the parties and intended to govern all relevant transactions between those parties

masterConfirmationAnnexDate.description: The date that an annex to the master confirmation was executed between the parties

matrixType.description: Identifies the form of applicable matrix

matrixPublicationDate.description: Specifies the publication date of the applicable version of the matrix. When this element is omitted, the ISDA supplemental language for incorporation of the relevant matrix will generally define rules for which version of the matrix is applicable.

matrixTerm.description: Defines any applicable key into the relevant matrix

iSDACreditMonolineInsurers.description: Indicates if a ISDA Credit Monoline Insurers contractual supplement will apply to the trade

iSDADeliveryRestrictions.description: Indicates if a ISDA Delivery Restrictions contractual supplement will apply to the trade

iSDASecuredDeliverableObligationCharacte.description: Indicates if a ISDA Secured Deliverable Obligation Characteristic contractual supplement will apply to the trade

iSDARecoveryLock.description: Indicates if a ISDA Recovery Lock contractual supplement will apply to the trade

iSDAFixedRecovery.description: Indicates if a ISDA Fixed Recovery contractual supplement will apply to the trade

contractualTermsSupplementPublicationDat.description: The contractual terms supplement publication date

calculationAgent.description: The ISDA calculation agent responsible for performing duties as defined in the applicable product definitions

calculationAgentBusinessCenter.description: The city in which the office through which ISDA Calculation Agent is acting for purposes of the transaction is located

pteTransactionDate.description: The transaction date for the post trade event (PTE)

pteEffectiveDate.description: The effective date for the post trade event. Will be on or after the pteTransactionDate

pteAffectedNotionalAmount.description: The affected notional amount for the PTE. (What notional is changing)

pteAffectedNotionalCurrency.description: The affected notional currency for the PTE

pteOutstandingNotionalAmount.description: The outstanding notional amount for the PTE. (What notional is left)

pteOutstandingNotionalCurrency.description: The outstanding notional currency for the PTE

ptePaymentAmount.description: The payment amount associated with the PTE

ptePaymentCurrency.description: The payment currency associated with the PTE

ptePaymentDate.description: The payment date associated with the PTE

ptePaymentPayer.description: The payment payer associated with the PTE

ptePaymentReceiver.description: The payment receiver associated with the PTE

exerciseEventType.description: The settlement style for the exercise, one of Cash or Physical

fullFirstCalculationPeriodApplicable.description: Whether the full first calculation period is applicable on assignments

transferee.description: The source platform id for the transferee on assignments

transferor.description: The source platform id for the transferor on assignments

remainingParty.description: The source platform id for the remaining party on assignments

remainingPartyTwo.description: The source platform id for the remaining party two on four way assignments

remainingPartyOldTradeId.description: The remaining party's TradeId on the OR/RP assignment leg

remainingPartyNewTradeId.description: The remaining party's TradeId on the EE/RP assignment leg

transfereeTradeId.description: The transferee party's TradeId on the EE/RP assignment leg

transferorTradeId.description: The transferor party's TradeId on the OR/RP assignment leg

legType.description: Whether this trade is the old leg (ORRP) or was created as a result of the new leg (EERP) of an assignment

novationType.description: The type of novation. Current values C-Only, C=C relate to Novation consent type

ncmId.description: The id for novation originating from a novation consent platform

adheredEventId.description: The id for a bulk novation/account swing adhered event

adheredEventName.description: The name for a bulk novation/account swing adhered event

adheredEventProcessingStatus.description: The processing status for a bulk novation/account swing adhered event

adheredEventType.description: The type of adhered event, one of BulkNovation or AccountSwing

dtccTiwId.description: The unique DTCC Trade Identifer provided at point of trade registration at the DTCC TIW. Applies to both sides of a position, maintained across lifecycle of trade

dtccTiwRegistrationStatus.description: Registration status of position at the DTCC TIW - always Registered

dtccTiwCurrentNotionalAsOfDate.description: Date reflecting the latest effective date of any activity that affects the notional for this position at the DTCC TIW

dtccTiwCurrentNotionalAmount.description: The current notional amount for this position at the DTCC TIW

dtccTiwCurrentNotionalCurrency.description: The current notional currency for this position at the DTCC TIW

dtccTiwOpenNotionalAmount.description: The current open notional amount for this position at the DTCC TIW
